entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper who has been trying to reason with Harry and is taking care of the dragon Norbert.

entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is a dragon that Hagrid has taken in and is caring for.

entities.description: Malfoy is a person who could potentially go to Dumbledore at any moment.

entities.name: dumbledore
